Spirit of Breeze and Tranquility

The south serenade by the top property developer in Bangladesh is a serene and majestic Apartment building in Bashundhara R/A. Edison South Serenade is an oasis of tranquility that evokes a subtle sense of calmness and prolonged respite. It is your ultimate resort of sublime comfort and deluxe. Featuring a multitude of luxurious living facilities, Edison South Serenade is a magnificent property.

Among those who aspire to live in Bashundhara R/a, there are few other properties available that can match the exquisiteness of this particular property. Built on a 20 Katha land the sheer size of this building is definitely awe inspiring. Housing a total of 46 deluxe apartments, this apartment building creates a community unto itself.

Built atop fourteen floors, the roof top offers a magnificent view of the surroundings. The roof top also features a scenic gazebo. The materials used for the building purposes are ensured highest quality standards. All fittings are premium over the top quality, including American standard sanitary ware, veneer flush door shutters, marble countertop basin, imported switches and other fittings. Every inch of living space in each apartment is designed keeping in mind the future interior choices of the residents. The entrance to the building is a grand double height entrance that welcomes residents and visitors. Ample parking space for each resident is a definite plus. The ground also covers an attractive garden. There is a spacious community hall for communal congregation and a dedicated prayer room. The whole building is provided with a backup diesel generator power supply.

Click here to see the apartment tour.

Adorned with soothing colors and aesthetic styling, South Serenade resides in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods of Dhaka city, Bashundhara. With an outburst of natural light in every apartment of every floor, it is built to accommodate the maximum amount of light and ventilation that connects the soul to the elements of nature.

So why wait, book your dream home in this southern breeze by calling 16760

To know more about the project visit: https://edisonrealestatebd.com/projects/south-serenade
